questions.title: People have different preferences in how resources should be allocated for different societal issues. Here we listed 9 different societal issues based on a popular donation website that has accumulated over 100 million dollars of donations. For each of the issues listed below, how important do you think the issue is to you and that more effort and resources should be contributed toward the issue?
